trans-unit.source: Specifies where a chart element, such as a legend or title, will be docked on the chart.
trans-unit.target: 指定位置的圖表項目，例如圖例或標題，將會停駐在圖表上。

trans-unit.source: The Docking enumeration represents the location on the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control where a chart element will be docked.
trans-unit.target: 停駐列舉表示的位置上<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控制項將會停駐的圖表項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>

trans-unit.source: Set the `IsDockedInsideChartArea` property of the relevant chart element to specify whether that element will be docked to the entire chart image or to a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>object.
trans-unit.target: 設定`IsDockedInsideChartArea`屬性來指定整個圖表影像上，或是否會停駐項目相關的圖表元素的<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>

trans-unit.source: The chart area is specified in the `DockedToChartArea` property of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 圖表區域中指定`DockedToChartArea`圖表元素的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the bottom of either the chart image or a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 停駐在底部的其中一個圖表影像或<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the left of either the chart image or a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 停駐在左邊的其中一個圖表影像或<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the right of either the chart image or a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 停駐在右邊的 圖表影像或<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Docked to the top of either the chart image or a <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 停駐於上方的圖表影像或<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref>物件。
